description: Understanding of web accessibility from a user and development point of view and have working experience with accessibility testing.
Solid knowledge on Web Components and its best practices.
Strong knowledge on front-end technologies like HTML, CSS (Flexbox, Grid, Nesting, BEM) and JavaScript.
Working knowledge on React, TypeScript, SASS and Astro.
Experience with backend technologies like Node.js, Express.js and PHP.
Comfortable working with relational MySQL and Postgres databases.
Experience creating and consuming RESTFUL APIs.
Experience with e2e testing with Cypress and Playwright, and automatic accessibility testing with Cypress.
Experience developing WordPress plugin and building custom Gutenberg blocks with React.
